long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a "Download Conversation" button at the bottom of the GPT chat window. 

- Fast, single click download.
- The file is formatted to show who is speaking (GPT or USER).
- File are named the same as the conversation id from the URL: https://chat.openai.com/chat/[id]
